abstract: The Clearing House Association, one of Wall Street’s oldest and most influential lobbying groups, has tapped Citigroup’s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, to lead its supervisory board.
snippet: The Clearing House Association, one of Wall Street’s oldest and most influential lobbying groups, has tapped Citigroup’s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, to lead its supervisory board.
lead_paragraph: The Clearing House Association, one of Wall Street’s oldest and most influential lobbying groups, has tapped Citigroup‘s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, to lead its supervisory board.

headline.main: Pandit Named Chairman of Clearing House Board
